resources.string: "The capital city of North Carolina is Charlotte
"Canada is south of the United States"
"The first in the Union was Delaware"
"The thirteenth state in the Union was North Carolina"
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas
Lake Baikal is the world oldest and deepest freshwater lake
"Are you sure you want to do this?"
